EmailTemplate.name: RS - Avidia DOER loan application received
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name}, your Mass Solar Loan application has been received!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for submitting your Mass Solar Loan application to Avidia Bank.
You will receive notice on your application status from our expert Solar Loan team at BlueWave within the next two business days. Upon application approval, BlueWave will follow up with final documentation to complete your enrollment with the Mass Solar Loan.
We're here if you have any questions about your Mass Solar Loan terms and conditions. Feel free to give us a call at 844.786.4100 or just send us an email at customercare@bluewavesolar.com.
Thank you again from all of us here at Avidia and BlueWave. Our cleaner, brighter energy future starts with you.
